mapper.insert: insert into DOCUMENTS ( DOC_ID, EMP_NO, DOC_NO, DOC_TITLE, DOC_CONTENTS, REG_DATE, SECURE_LEVEL ) values((select NVL(MAX(DOC_ID), 0) + 1 FROM DOCUMENTS), #{empNo}, #{docNo}, #{docTitle}, #{docContents}, to_date(#{regDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{secureLevel} )
mapper.select:
SELECT D.DOC_ID, E.EMP_NAME, D.DOC_NO, D.DOC_TITLE, D.REG_DATE, D.DONE_DATE, D.SECURE_LEVEL FROM DOCUMENTS D JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON D.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO
DONE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND SECURE_LEVEL BETWEEN #{secureLevel} AND 'C' ORDER BY D.REG_DATE DESC
